LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PsyfocusStaff.description: An arcane staff threaded with mana focusing materials. While it is a solid melee weapon, its main purpose is to enhance the wielder's magical aptitude and assist with arcane load dissipation, allowing more use of spells.
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_PsyfocusStaff.label: arcanium staff
